evidence.source_document: Status Update Regarding Settlement by Legislation
evidence.text: On April 19, 2022, SC NAACP and House Defendants (“the Parties”) reached an agreement in principle to resolve their litigation about the House redistricting plan.

evidence.source_document: Status Update Regarding Settlement by Legislation
evidence.text: presented to the Governor on or before May 12, 2022

extracted.value: May 12, 2022: Settlement Maps presented to Governor

evidence.source_document: Status Update Regarding Settlement by Legislation
evidence.text: signed into law on or before May 17, 2022

extracted.value: May 17, 2022: Settlement Maps signed into law
